channel.title: Lately on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Lately
item.description:
I’ve been slacking a little bit as of late, mostly in shock by what is happening in the world, but also because I’ve been busy at work and, unfortunately, taking my old man to way to many medical checkups. Anyways, I thought I short recap of notable facts might be in order.

  • FatturaElettronica 2.6 released.
  • Eve pull-requests merged.
  • Hiking
  • Twitter account disabled
  • DevRomagna meetups
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been slacking a little bit as of late, mostly in shock by what is happening in the world, but also because I’ve been busy at work and, unfortunately, taking my old man to way to many medical checkups. Anyways, I thought I short recap of notable facts might be in order.

  • FatturaElettronica 2.6 released.
  • Eve pull-requests merged.
  • Hiking
  • Twitter account disabled
  • DevRomagna meetups
